ayas.arabic: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ
ayas.translation: In the name of Allah, most benevolent, ever-merciful.
ayas.transliteration: bismillāhir raḥmānir raḥīm

ayas.arabic: الٓر ۚ تِلْكَ ءَايَـٰتُ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ وَقُرْءَانٍ مُّبِينٍ
ayas.translation: ALIF LAM RA. These are the verses of the Book and the perspicuous oration.
ayas.transliteration: alif lām rā ۚ tilka āyātul kitābi waqur-ānin mubīn

ayas.arabic: رُّبَمَا يَوَدُّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ لَوْ كَانُوا۟ مُسْلِمِينَ
ayas.translation: The unbelievers would haply like to wish that they had submitted (and become Muslim).
ayas.transliteration: rubamā yawaddul ladhīna kafarū law kānū muslimīn

ayas.arabic: ذَرْهُمْ يَأْكُلُوا۟ وَيَتَمَتَّعُوا۟ وَيُلْهِهِمُ ٱلْأَمَلُ ۖ فَسَوْفَ يَعْلَمُونَ
ayas.translation: Leave them to feast and revel, beguiled by hope; they will come to know soon.
ayas.transliteration: dharhum ya-kulū wayatamatta`ū wayulhihimul-amal ۖ fasawfa ya`lamūn

ayas.arabic: وَمَآ أَهْلَكْنَا مِن قَرْيَةٍ إِلَّا وَلَهَا كِتَابٌ مَّعْلُومٌ
ayas.translation: Not one habitation have We destroyed but at the time determined for it.
ayas.transliteration: wa mā ahlaknā min qaryatin illā walahā kitābun ma`lūm

ayas.arabic: مَّا تَسْبِقُ مِنْ أُمَّةٍ أَجَلَهَا وَمَا يَسْتَـْٔخِرُونَ
ayas.translation: No people can hasten or delay the term already fixed for them.
ayas.transliteration: mā tasbiqu min ummatin ajalahā wa mā yasta-khirūn

ayas.arabic: وَقَالُوا۟ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِى نُزِّلَ عَلَيْهِ ٱلذِّكْرُ إِنَّكَ لَمَجْنُونٌ
ayas.translation: And yet they say: "You, to whom this Exposition has been sent are surely possessed of the Devil.
ayas.transliteration: waqālū yā-ayyuhal ladhī nuzzila `alayhidh dhikru innaka lamajnūn

ayas.arabic: لَّوْ مَا تَأْتِينَا بِٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةِ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰدِقِينَ
ayas.translation: If you are a man of truth, why can't you bring the angels to us?"
ayas.transliteration: law mā ta-tīnā bil malā-ikati in kunta minaṣ ṣādiqīn

ayas.arabic: مَا نُنَزِّلُ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةَ إِلَّا بِٱلْحَقِّ وَمَا كَانُوٓا۟ إِذًا مُّنظَرِينَ
ayas.translation: But then We never send the angels down save with the purpose (of enforcing their doom), after which they will not be given more respite.
ayas.transliteration: mā nunazzilul malā-ikata illā bil ḥaqqi wa mā kānū idhan munẓarīn

ayas.arabic: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نَزَّلْنَا ٱلذِّكْرَ وَإِنَّا لَهُۥ لَحَـٰفِظُونَ
ayas.translation: We have sent down this Exposition, and We will guard it.
ayas.transliteration: innā naḥnu nazzalnadh dhikra wa innā lahu laḥāfiẓūn

ayas.arabic: وَلَقَدْ أَرْسَلْنَا مِن قَبْلِكَ فِى شِيَعِ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
ayas.translation: We had also sent apostles to people of earlier persuasions.
ayas.transliteration: walaqad arsalnā min qablika fī shiya`il-awwalīn

ayas.arabic: وَمَا يَأْتِيهِم مِّن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا كَانُوا۟ بِهِۦ يَسْتَهْزِءُونَ
ayas.translation: But never once an apostle came to them at whom they did not scoff.
ayas.transliteration: wa mā ya-tīhim min rasūlin illā kānū bihi yastahzi-ūn

ayas.arabic: كَذَٰلِكَ نَسْلُكُهُۥ فِى قُلُوبِ ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ
ayas.translation: We place in the hearts of sinners (disbelief).
ayas.transliteration: kadhālika naslukuhu fī qulūbil mujrimīn

ayas.arabic: لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِهِۦ ۖ وَقَدْ خَلَتْ سُنَّةُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
ayas.translation: So, they will not believe in it: The example of former people is there.
ayas.transliteration: lā yu-minūna bih ۖ waqad khalat sunnatul-awwalīn

ayas.arabic: وَلَوْ فَتَحْنَا عَلَيْهِم بَابًا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ فَظَلُّوا۟ فِيهِ يَعْرُجُونَ
ayas.translation: Even if We open a door in the heavens and they ascend through it in broad daylight,
ayas.transliteration: walaw fataḥnā `alayhim bāban minas samā-i faẓallū fīhi ya`rujūn

ayas.arabic: لَقَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّمَا سُكِّرَتْ أَبْصَـٰرُنَا بَلْ نَحْنُ قَوْمٌ مَّسْحُورُونَ
ayas.translation: They will say all the same: "Our eyes were dazed (and clouded over). We were a people ensorcelled."
ayas.transliteration: laqālū innamā sukkirat abṣārunā bal naḥnu qawmun mas-ḥūrūn

ayas.arabic: وَلَقَدْ جَعَلْنَا فِى ٱلسَّمَآءِ بُرُوجًا وَزَيَّنَّـٰهَا لِلنَّـٰظِرِينَ
ayas.translation: We have placed the signs of the Zodiac in the sky, and decked it out for those who can see;
ayas.transliteration: walaqad ja`alnā fis samā-i burūjan wazayyannāhā linnāẓirīn

ayas.arabic: وَحَفِظْنَـٰهَا مِن كُلِّ شَيْطَـٰنٍ رَّجِيمٍ
ayas.translation: And We have preserved it from every accursed devil,
ayas.transliteration: waḥafiẓnāhā min kulli shayṭānin rajīm

ayas.arabic: إِلَّا مَنِ ٱسْتَرَقَ ٱلسَّمْعَ فَأَتْبَعَهُۥ شِهَابٌ مُّبِينٌ
ayas.translation: Except the ones who listen on the sly, yet they are chased away by a shooting flame.
ayas.transliteration: illā manis-taraqas sam`a fa-atba`ahu shihābun mubīn

ayas.arabic: وَٱلْأَرْضَ مَدَدْنَـٰهَا وَأَلْقَيْنَا فِيهَا رَوَٰسِىَ وَأَنۢبَتْنَا فِيهَا مِن كُلِّ شَىْءٍ مَّوْزُونٍ
ayas.translation: We stretched the earth and placed upon it firm stabilisers, and made all things grow upon it balanced evenly.
ayas.transliteration: wal-arḍa madadnāhā wa-alqaynā fīhā rawāsiya wa-anbatnā fīhā min kulli shay-in mawzūn

ayas.arabic: وَجَعَلْنَا لَكُمْ فِيهَا مَعَـٰيِشَ وَمَن لَّسْتُمْ لَهُۥ بِرَٰزِقِينَ
ayas.translation: We have provided on it sustenance for you, and for those you cannot provide.
ayas.transliteration: waja`alnā lakum fīhā ma`āyisha wa man lastum lahu birāziqīn

ayas.arabic: وَإِن مِّن شَىْءٍ إِلَّا عِندَنَا خَزَآئِنُهُۥ وَمَا نُنَزِّلُهُۥٓ إِلَّا بِقَدَرٍ مَّعْلُومٍ
ayas.translation: Of all things there are We have the stores, and send them down in determined measure.
ayas.transliteration: wa in min shay-in illā `indanā khazā-inuhu wa mā nunazziluhu illā biqadarin ma`lūm

ayas.arabic: وَأَرْسَلْنَا ٱلرِّيَـٰحَ لَوَٰقِحَ فَأَنزَلْنَا مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءً فَأَسْقَيْنَـٰكُمُوهُ وَمَآ أَنتُمْ لَهُۥ بِخَـٰزِنِينَ
ayas.translation: We send rain-impregnated winds, and water from the sky which you drink, but you are not the keepers of its store.
ayas.transliteration: wa-arsalnar riyāḥa lawāqiḥa fa-anzalnā minas samā-i mā-an fa-asqaynākumūhu wa mā antum lahu bikhāzinīn

ayas.arabic: وَإِنَّا لَنَحْنُ نُحْىِۦ وَنُمِيتُ وَنَحْنُ ٱلْوَٰرِثُونَ
ayas.translation: It is We who give life and We who give death, and We are the One who will abide.
ayas.transliteration: wa innā lanaḥnu nuḥyī wanumītu wanaḥnul wārithūn

ayas.arabic: وَلَقَدْ عَلِمْنَا ٱلْمُسْتَقْدِمِينَ مِنكُمْ وَلَقَدْ عَلِمْنَا ٱلْمُسْتَـْٔخِرِينَ
ayas.translation: We surely know those of you who go forward and those of you who lag behind.
ayas.transliteration: walaqad `alimnal mustaqdimīna minkum walaqad `alimnal musta-khirīn

ayas.arabic: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ يَحْشُرُهُمْ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ حَكِيمٌ عَلِيمٌ
ayas.translation: Your Lord will surely gather them together: Certainly He is all-wise and all-knowing.
ayas.transliteration: wa inna rabbaka huwa yaḥshuruhum ۚ innahu ḥakīmun `alīm

ayas.arabic: وَلَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ مِن صَلْصَـٰلٍ مِّنْ حَمَإٍ مَّسْنُونٍ
ayas.translation: Man We fashioned from fermented clay dried tingling hard,
ayas.transliteration: walaqad khalaqnal-insāna min ṣalṣālin min ḥama-in masnūn

ayas.arabic: وَٱلْجَآنَّ خَلَقْنَـٰهُ مِن قَبْلُ مِن نَّارِ ٱلسَّمُومِ
ayas.translation: As We fashioned jinns before from intense radiated heat.
ayas.transliteration: wal jānna khalaqnāhu min qablu min nāris samūm

ayas.arabic: وَإِذْ قَالَ رَبُّكَ لِلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةِ إِنِّى خَـٰلِقٌۢ بَشَرًا مِّن صَلْصَـٰلٍ مِّنْ حَمَإٍ مَّسْنُونٍ
ayas.translation: But when your Lord said to the angels: "I am verily going to create a human being from fermented clay dried tingling hard;
ayas.transliteration: wa idh qāla rabbuka lil-malā-ikati innī khāliqun basharan min ṣalṣālin min ḥama-in masnūn

ayas.arabic: فَإِذَا سَوَّيْتُهُۥ وَنَفَخْتُ فِيهِ مِن رُّوحِى فَقَعُوا۟ لَهُۥ سَـٰجِدِينَ
ayas.translation: And when I have fashioned him and breathed into him of My spirit, bow before him in homage;"
ayas.transliteration: fa-idhā sawwaytuhu wanafakhtu fīhi min rūḥī faqa`ū lahu sājidīn

ayas.arabic: فَسَجَدَ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ كُلُّهُمْ أَجْمَعُونَ
ayas.translation: The angels bowed in homage in a body
ayas.transliteration: fasajadal malā-ikatu kulluhum ajma`ūn

ayas.arabic: إِلَّآ إِبْلِيسَ أَبَىٰٓ أَن يَكُونَ مَعَ ٱلسَّـٰجِدِينَ
ayas.translation: Except Iblis. He refused to bow with the adorers.
ayas.transliteration: illā iblīsa abā an yakūna ma`as sājidīn

ayas.arabic: قَالَ يَـٰٓإِبْلِيسُ مَا لَكَ أَلَّا تَكُونَ مَعَ ٱلسَّـٰجِدِينَ
ayas.translation: "How is it, O Iblis," said (the Lord), "you did not join those who bowed in homage?"
ayas.transliteration: qāla yā-iblīsu mā laka allā takūna ma`as sājidīn

ayas.arabic: قَالَ لَمْ أَكُن لِّأَسْجُدَ لِبَشَرٍ خَلَقْتَهُۥ مِن صَلْصَـٰلٍ مِّنْ حَمَإٍ مَّسْنُونٍ
ayas.translation: "How could I bow," said he, "before a mortal whom You created from fermented clay dried tingling hard?"
ayas.transliteration: qāla lam akun li-asjuda libasharin khalaqtahu min ṣalṣālin min ḥama-in masnūn

ayas.arabic: قَالَ فَٱخْرُجْ مِنْهَا فَإِنَّكَ رَجِيمٌ
ayas.translation: "Go hence, execrable," (said the Lord), "from this place,
ayas.transliteration: qāla fakhruj minhā fa-innaka rajīm

ayas.arabic: وَإِنَّ عَلَيْكَ ٱللَّعْنَةَ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ ٱلدِّينِ
ayas.translation: Condemned till the day of Doom!"
ayas.transliteration: wa inna `alaykalla`nata ilā yawmid dīn

ayas.arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ فَأَنظِرْنِىٓ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ يُبْعَثُونَ
ayas.translation: "O my Lord," said he, "give me respite till the day the dead are raised."
ayas.transliteration: qāla rabbi fa-anẓirnī ilā yawmi yub`athūn

ayas.arabic: قَالَ فَإِنَّكَ مِنَ ٱلْمُنظَرِينَ
ayas.translation: "You are among the reprieved," (said the Lord),
ayas.transliteration: qāla fa-innaka minal munẓarīn

ayas.arabic: إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ ٱلْوَقْتِ ٱلْمَعْلُومِ
ayas.translation: "Till the predetermined time."
ayas.transliteration: ilā yawmil waqtil ma`lūm

ayas.arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ بِمَآ أَغْوَيْتَنِى لَأُزَيِّنَنَّ لَهُمْ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَلَأُغْوِيَنَّهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
ayas.translation: "O my Lord," he said, "since You have led me into error I'll beguile them with the pleasures of the world and lead them astray,
ayas.transliteration: qāla rabbi bimā aghwaytanī la-uzayyinanna lahum fil-arḍi wala-ughwiyannahum ajma`īn

ayas.arabic: إِلَّا عِبَادَكَ مِنْهُمُ ٱلْمُخْلَصِينَ
ayas.translation: Except the chosen ones among Your creatures."
ayas.transliteration: illā `ibādaka minhumul mukhlaṣīn

ayas.arabic: قَالَ هَـٰذَا صِرَٰطٌ عَلَىَّ مُسْتَقِيمٌ
ayas.translation: (To which God) said: "This way is right by Me.
ayas.transliteration: qāla hādhā ṣirāṭun `alayya mustaqīm

ayas.arabic: إِنَّ عِبَادِى لَيْسَ لَكَ عَلَيْهِمْ سُلْطَـٰنٌ إِلَّا مَنِ ٱتَّبَعَكَ مِنَ ٱلْغَاوِينَ
ayas.translation: No power shall you have over (all) My creatures except those who fall into error and follow you,
ayas.transliteration: inna `ibādī laysa laka `alayhim sulṭānun illā manit-taba`aka minal ghāwyn

ayas.arabic: وَإِنَّ جَهَنَّمَ لَمَوْعِدُهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
ayas.translation: For whom the ordained place is surely Hell,
ayas.transliteration: wa inna jahannama lamaw`iduhum ajma`īn

ayas.arabic: لَهَا سَبْعَةُ أَبْوَٰبٍ لِّكُلِّ بَابٍ مِّنْهُمْ جُزْءٌ مَّقْسُومٌ
ayas.translation: Which has several gates, and each gate is marked for every section of them."
ayas.transliteration: lahā sab`atu abwābin likulli bābin minhum juz-un maqsūm

ayas.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ فِى جَنَّـٰتٍ وَعُيُونٍ
ayas.translation: Verily those who keep away from evil and follow the straight path shall be in the midst of gardens and springs of water.
ayas.transliteration: innal muttaqīna fī jannātin wa`uyūn

ayas.arabic: ٱدْخُلُوهَا بِسَلَـٰمٍ ءَامِنِينَ
ayas.translation: "Enter in peace and tranquility," (they will be told).
ayas.transliteration: ud-khulūhā bisalāmin āminīn

ayas.arabic: وَنَزَعْنَا مَا فِى صُدُورِهِم مِّنْ غِلٍّ إِخْوَٰنًا عَلَىٰ سُرُرٍ مُّتَقَـٰبِلِينَ
ayas.translation: We shall cast out any grudge they may have in their hearts. (There) they will sit on couches face to face like brothers together.
ayas.transliteration: wanaza`nā mā fī ṣudūrihim min ghillin ikhwānan `alā sururin mutaqābilīn

ayas.arabic: لَا يَمَسُّهُمْ فِيهَا نَصَبٌ وَمَا هُم مِّنْهَا بِمُخْرَجِينَ
ayas.translation: No weariness will come upon them, nor will they be sent away from there.
ayas.transliteration: lā yamassuhum fīhā naṣabun wa mā hum minhā bimukhrajīn

ayas.arabic: نَبِّئْ عِبَادِىٓ أَنِّىٓ أَنَا ٱلْغَفُورُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
ayas.translation: Announce to My creatures that I am indeed forgiving and kind,
ayas.transliteration: nabbi-`ibādī annī anal ghafūrur raḥīm

ayas.arabic: وَأَنَّ عَذَابِى هُوَ ٱلْعَذَابُ ٱلْأَلِيمُ
ayas.translation: But My punishment is surely a painful one.
ayas.transliteration: wa-anna `adhābī huwal `adhābul-alīm

ayas.arabic: وَنَبِّئْهُمْ عَن ضَيْفِ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ
ayas.translation: Inform them about the matter of Abraham's guests.
ayas.transliteration: wanabbi-hum `an ḍayfi ibrāhīm

ayas.arabic: إِذْ دَخَلُوا۟ عَلَيْهِ فَقَالُوا۟ سَلَـٰمًا قَالَ إِنَّا مِنكُمْ وَجِلُونَ
ayas.translation: When they came to him and said: "Peace," he answered: "Truly we are afraid of you."
ayas.transliteration: idh dakhalū `alayhi faqālū salāman qāla innā minkum wajilūn

ayas.arabic: قَالُوا۟ لَا تَوْجَلْ إِنَّا نُبَشِّرُكَ بِغُلَـٰمٍ عَلِيمٍ
ayas.translation: "Have no fear," they said. "We bring you news of a son full of wisdom."
ayas.transliteration: qālū lā tawjal innā nubashhiruka bighulāmin `alīm

ayas.arabic: قَالَ أَبَشَّرْتُمُونِى عَلَىٰٓ أَن مَّسَّنِىَ ٱلْكِبَرُ فَبِمَ تُبَشِّرُونَ
ayas.translation: "You bring me the good news now," he said, "when old age has come upon me. What good news are you giving me then?"
ayas.transliteration: qāla abashhartumūnī `alā an massaniyal kibaru fabima tubashhirūn

ayas.arabic: قَالُوا۟ بَشَّرْنَـٰكَ بِٱلْحَقِّ فَلَا تَكُن مِّنَ ٱلْقَـٰنِطِينَ
ayas.translation: "We have given you the happy tidings of a truth," they replied. "So do not be one of those who despair."
ayas.transliteration: qālū bashharnāka bil ḥaqqi falā takun minal qāniṭīn

ayas.arabic: قَالَ وَمَن يَقْنَطُ مِن رَّحْمَةِ رَبِّهِۦٓ إِلَّا ٱلضَّآلُّونَ
ayas.translation: "Who would despair of the mercy of his Lord," he answered, "but those who go astray."
ayas.transliteration: qāla wa man yaqnaṭu min raḥmati rabbihi illaḍ ḍāllūn

ayas.arabic: قَالَ فَمَا خَطْبُكُمْ أَيُّهَا ٱلْمُرْسَلُونَ
ayas.translation: And asked them: "What matter, O angels, brings you here?"
ayas.transliteration: qāla famā khaṭbukum ayyuhal mursalūn

ayas.arabic: قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّآ أُرْسِلْنَآ إِلَىٰ قَوْمٍ مُّجْرِمِينَ
ayas.translation: "We have been sent," they said, "to (punish) a sinful people,
ayas.transliteration: qālū innā ursilnā ilā qawmin mujrimīn

ayas.arabic: إِلَّآ ءَالَ لُوطٍ إِنَّا لَمُنَجُّوهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
ayas.translation: "Except the family of Lot whom we shall save
ayas.transliteration: illā āla lūṭin innā lamunajjūhum ajma`īn

ayas.arabic: إِلَّا ٱمْرَأَتَهُۥ قَدَّرْنَآ ۙ إِنَّهَا لَمِنَ ٱلْغَـٰبِرِينَ
ayas.translation: "Other than his wife who, it is decreed, will remain with those who will stay behind."
ayas.transliteration: illam-ra-atahu qaddarnā innahā laminal ghābirīn

ayas.arabic: فَلَمَّا جَآءَ ءَالَ لُوطٍ ٱلْمُرْسَلُونَ
ayas.translation: When the messengers came to the family of Lot,
ayas.transliteration: falammā jā-a āla lūṭinil-mursalūn

ayas.arabic: قَالَ إِنَّكُمْ قَوْمٌ مُّنكَرُونَ
ayas.translation: He said: "You are people I do not know."
ayas.transliteration: qāla innakum qawmun munkarūn

ayas.arabic: قَالُوا۟ بَلْ جِئْنَـٰكَ بِمَا كَانُوا۟ فِيهِ يَمْتَرُونَ
ayas.translation: "We have come to you with news," they said, "of what your people doubt;
ayas.transliteration: qālū bal ji-nāka bimā kānū fīhi yamtarūn

ayas.arabic: وَأَتَيْنَـٰكَ بِٱلْحَقِّ وَإِنَّا لَصَـٰدِقُونَ
ayas.translation: "Yet we bring to you the truth, and we are truthful.
ayas.transliteration: wa-ataynāka bil ḥaqqi wa innā laṣādiqūn

ayas.arabic: فَأَسْرِ بِأَهْلِكَ بِقِطْعٍ مِّنَ ٱلَّيْلِ وَٱتَّبِعْ أَدْبَـٰرَهُمْ وَلَا يَلْتَفِتْ مِنكُمْ أَحَدٌ وَٱمْضُوا۟ حَيْثُ تُؤْمَرُونَ
ayas.translation: "So leave with your family late in the night, yourself remaining in the rear, and let none turn back to look, and go where you will be commanded."
ayas.transliteration: fa-asri bi-ahlika biqiṭ`in minal layli wattabi` adbārahum walā yaltafit minkum aḥadun wamḍū ḥaythu tu-marūn

ayas.arabic: وَقَضَيْنَآ إِلَيْهِ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْأَمْرَ أَنَّ دَابِرَ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ مَقْطُوعٌ مُّصْبِحِينَ
ayas.translation: We issued this command to him, for they were going to be destroyed in the morning.
ayas.transliteration: waqaḍaynā ilayhi dhālikal-amra anna dābira hā-ulā-i maqṭū`un muṣbiḥīn

ayas.arabic: وَجَآءَ أَهْلُ ٱلْمَدِينَةِ يَسْتَبْشِرُونَ
ayas.translation: Then came the people of the city, exulting at the news.
ayas.transliteration: wajā-a ahlul madīnati yastabshirūn

ayas.arabic: قَالَ إِنَّ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ ضَيْفِى فَلَا تَفْضَحُونِ
ayas.translation: Said Lot: "These are my guests; do not put me to shame,
ayas.transliteration: qāla inna hā-ulā-i ḍayfī falā tafḍaḥūn

ayas.arabic: وَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَلَا تُخْزُونِ
ayas.translation: "And do not disgrace me. Have some fear of God."
ayas.transliteration: wattaqullāha walā tukhzūn

ayas.arabic: قَالُوٓا۟ أَوَلَمْ نَنْهَكَ عَنِ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
ayas.translation: "Did we not restrain you," they said, "from (entertaining) creatures from the outside world?"
ayas.transliteration: qālū awalam nanhaka `anil `ālamīn

ayas.arabic: قَالَ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ بَنَاتِىٓ إِن كُنتُمْ فَـٰعِلِينَ
ayas.translation: "Here are my daughters," said Lot, "if you are so active."
ayas.transliteration: qāla hā-ulā-i banātī in kuntum fā`ilīn

ayas.arabic: لَعَمْرُكَ إِنَّهُمْ لَفِى سَكْرَتِهِمْ يَعْمَهُونَ
ayas.translation: Verily by your life they were utterly confused in their (lustful) drunkenness.
ayas.transliteration: la`amruka innahum lafī sakratihim ya`mahūn

ayas.arabic: فَأَخَذَتْهُمُ ٱلصَّيْحَةُ مُشْرِقِينَ
ayas.translation: So they were seized by the mighty blast at break of day;
ayas.transliteration: fa-akhadhat-humuṣ ṣayḥatu mushriqīn

ayas.arabic: فَجَعَلْنَا عَـٰلِيَهَا سَافِلَهَا وَأَمْطَرْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ حِجَارَةً مِّن سِجِّيلٍ
ayas.translation: And We turned the city upside down, and rained on them stones of hardened lava.
ayas.transliteration: faja`alnā `āliyahā sāfilahā wa-amṭarnā `alayhim ḥijāratan min sijjīl

ayas.arabic: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَـٰتٍ لِّلْمُتَوَسِّمِينَ
ayas.translation: Herein are really signs for those who discern.
ayas.transliteration: inna fī dhālika la-āyātin lil-mutawassimīn

ayas.arabic: وَإِنَّهَا لَبِسَبِيلٍ مُّقِيمٍ
ayas.translation: This (city) lies on a road that still survives.
ayas.transliteration: wa innahā labisabīlin muqīm

ayas.arabic: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَةً لِّلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
ayas.translation: Indeed there is a portent in this for those who believe.
ayas.transliteration: inna fī dhālika la-āyatan lil-mu-minīn

ayas.arabic: وَإِن كَانَ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلْأَيْكَةِ لَظَـٰلِمِينَ
ayas.translation: The dwellers of the Wood (near Midian) were also wicked.
ayas.transliteration: wa in kāna aṣ-ḥābul-aykati laẓālimīn

ayas.arabic: فَٱنتَقَمْنَا مِنْهُمْ وَإِنَّهُمَا لَبِإِمَامٍ مُّبِينٍ
ayas.translation: So We punished them too. They are both situated by the highway, clearly visible.
ayas.transliteration: fantaqamnā minhum wa innahumā labi-imāmin mubīn

ayas.arabic: وَلَقَدْ كَذَّبَ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلْحِجْرِ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
ayas.translation: The people of Al-Hijr denied Our apostles;
ayas.transliteration: walaqad kadhhaba aṣ-ḥābul ḥijril mursalīn

ayas.arabic: وَءَاتَيْنَـٰهُمْ ءَايَـٰتِنَا فَكَانُوا۟ عَنْهَا مُعْرِضِينَ
ayas.translation: And though We had given them Our signs they turned away from them.
ayas.transliteration: wa-ātaynāhum āyātinā fakānū `anhā mu`riḍīn

ayas.arabic: وَكَانُوا۟ يَنْحِتُونَ مِنَ ٱلْجِبَالِ بُيُوتًا ءَامِنِينَ
ayas.translation: They used to hew dwellings in the mountains to live in security.
ayas.transliteration: wakānū yanḥitūna minal jibāli buyūtan āminīn

ayas.arabic: فَأَخَذَتْهُمُ ٱلصَّيْحَةُ مُصْبِحِينَ
ayas.translation: But they were seized by the mighty blast towards the morning;
ayas.transliteration: fa-akhadhat-humuṣ ṣayḥatu muṣbiḥīn

ayas.arabic: فَمَآ أَغْنَىٰ عَنْهُم مَّا كَانُوا۟ يَكْسِبُونَ
ayas.translation: And all that they had done (for security) availed them nothing.
ayas.transliteration: famā aghnā `anhum mā kānū yaksibūn

ayas.arabic: وَمَا خَلَقْنَا ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَآ إِلَّا بِٱلْحَقِّ ۗ وَإِنَّ ٱلسَّاعَةَ لَـَٔاتِيَةٌ ۖ فَٱصْفَحِ ٱلصَّفْحَ ٱلْجَمِيلَ
ayas.translation: We have not created but with reason the heavens and the earth and all that lies within them. The Hour (of the great change) is certain to come. So turn away (from them) with a grace.
ayas.transliteration: wa mā khalaqnas samāwāti wal-arḍa wa mā baynahumā illā bil ḥaqq ۗ wa innas sā`ata la-ātiyah ۖ faṣfaḥiṣ ṣafḥal jamīl

ayas.arabic: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ ٱلْخَلَّـٰقُ ٱلْعَلِيمُ
ayas.translation: Surely your Lord is the Creator and knows (everything).
ayas.transliteration: inna rabbaka huwal khallāqul `alīm

ayas.arabic: وَلَقَدْ ءَاتَيْنَـٰكَ سَبْعًا مِّنَ ٱلْمَثَانِى وَٱلْقُرْءَانَ ٱلْعَظِيمَ
ayas.translation: We have indeed given you the seven oft-repeated (examples), and the majestic Qur'an.
ayas.transliteration: walaqad ātaynāka sab`an minal mathānī wal qur-ānal `aẓīm

ayas.arabic: لَا تَمُدَّنَّ عَيْنَيْكَ إِلَىٰ مَا مَتَّعْنَا بِهِۦٓ أَزْوَٰجًا مِّنْهُمْ وَلَا تَحْزَنْ عَلَيْهِمْ وَٱخْفِضْ جَنَاحَكَ لِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
ayas.translation: So covet not things We have bestowed on a portion of them to enjoy, and do not grieve for them, and protect those who believe;
ayas.transliteration: lā tamuddanna `aynayka ilā mā matta`nā bihi azwājan minhum walā taḥzan `alayhim wakhfiḍ janāḥaka lil-mu-minīn

ayas.arabic: وَقُلْ إِنِّىٓ أَنَا ٱلنَّذِيرُ ٱلْمُبِينُ
ayas.translation: And say: "I am a distinct warner,"
ayas.transliteration: waqul innī anan nadhīrul mubīn

ayas.arabic: كَمَآ أَنزَلْنَا عَلَى ٱلْمُقْتَسِمِينَ
ayas.translation: Like (those) We had sent to those schismatics who slandered their Books
ayas.transliteration: kamā anzalnā `alal-muqtasimīn

ayas.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ جَعَلُوا۟ ٱلْقُرْءَانَ عِضِينَ
ayas.translation: And severed their Scripture into fragments.
ayas.transliteration: alladhīna ja`alul qur-āna `iḍīn

ayas.arabic: فَوَرَبِّكَ لَنَسْـَٔلَنَّهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
ayas.translation: By your Lord We shall question them one and all
ayas.transliteration: fawarabbika lanas-alannahum ajma`īn

ayas.arabic: عَمَّا كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ
ayas.translation: About their deeds.
ayas.transliteration: `ammā kānū ya`malūn

ayas.arabic: فَٱصْدَعْ بِمَا تُؤْمَرُ وَأَعْرِضْ عَنِ ٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ
ayas.translation: So declare to them what We have enjoined, and turn away from idolaters.
ayas.transliteration: faṣda` bimā tu-maru wa-a`riḍ `anil mushrikīn

ayas.arabic: إِنَّا كَفَيْنَـٰكَ ٱلْمُسْتَهْزِءِينَ
ayas.translation: We are surely sufficient to deal with those who scoff at you,
ayas.transliteration: innā kafaynākal mustahzi-iyn

ayas.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَجْعَلُونَ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَـٰهًا ءَاخَرَ ۚ فَسَوْفَ يَعْلَمُونَ
ayas.translation: Who place other gods besides God. They will come to know soon.
ayas.transliteration: alladhīna yaj`alūna ma`allāhi ilāhan ākhar ۚ fasawfa ya`lamūn

ayas.arabic: وَلَقَدْ نَعْلَمُ أَنَّكَ يَضِيقُ صَدْرُكَ بِمَا يَقُولُونَ
ayas.translation: We are well aware that you are disheartened by what they say.
ayas.transliteration: walaqad na`lamu annaka yaḍīqu ṣadruka bimā yaqūlūn

ayas.arabic: فَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ وَكُن مِّنَ ٱلسَّـٰجِدِينَ
ayas.translation: But you should glorify your Lord with praises, and be among those who bow in submission;
ayas.transliteration: fasabbiḥ biḥamdi rabbika wakun minas sājidīn

ayas.arabic: وَٱعْبُدْ رَبَّكَ حَتَّىٰ يَأْتِيَكَ ٱلْيَقِينُ
ayas.translation: And go on worshipping your Lord till the certainty (of death) comes upon you.
ayas.transliteration: wa`bud rabbaka ḥattā ya-tiyakal yaqīn
